name: Dwarven Destiny
description:
You play as a human mage who's been summoned to the Dwarf Kingdom of "???" to help them research a mysterious Dwarf artifact. 

Meet up to six potential Dwarf love interests as you try to unravel the mysteries of the Dwarven Artifact. 

Characters Horgath

A gruff and cranky blacksmith. He seems to be uncannily perceptive...

Oghram

 An arrogant and proud guardsman. He takes great pride in defending his kingdom and assumes a lot about you. 

Panya

A baker at the Inn who approaches life cheerfully with brimming passion. 

Kellan

A researcher who prizes intelligence, but can be a bit moody at times.

Arondal

A prosperous merchant who comes across as cheerful and friendly.

????

An unknown prisoner who is suspicious of you when you two first meet.  

... More coming. 

Please enjoy the demo for Bara Jam 2021!
